name: SEX SPA 🔞💦
description:
Welcome to the fascinating world of S.E.X. Retreat: WellCum In!, a visual novel for adults! 🌟💋

Immerse yourself in a captivating story where the main character, tired of failures and searching, decides to start a new chapter in a different spa. Hoping for a fresh start, he quickly realizes that this salon is unlike any other.

In this salon, clients are willing to pay not only with money but also with emotions, making each day special. However, when strange events unfold and his colleague Douglas decides to do whatever it takes, including intrigue and confusion, it becomes increasingly challenging to navigate this path.

Every day, the protagonist receives mysterious notes that further complicate his life. Will he be able to withstand the pressure of time and sexual competition, or will he lose everything he has worked for?

S.E.X. Retreat: WellCum In! is not just a game; it's a journey into the world of intrigue, sexual freedom, and secrets. Get ready for exciting challenges and surprises in this captivating world where every choice has unpredictable consequences!

Are you ready to embark on this sensual adventure?💓🔥

Features:
  • An immersive storyline filled with emotional twists and moments that will make your heart race.
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Minigames
  • Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
  • VN Style story with dynamic camera angles, and outfits you select
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
